abstract: Bank of America has agreed to buy back as much as $4.7 billion in auction-rate securities to settle charges that it misled thousands of customers about the risky investments, federal and New York state regulators said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has agreed to buy back as much as $4.7 billion in auction-rate securities to settle charges that it misled thousands of customers about the risky investments, federal and New York state regulators said Wednesday.

headline.main: Bank of America Agrees to Buy Back Auction-Rate Securities
